about_the_game:
After MC has been living peacefully through life as an adventurer for two whole years not really interested in leveling up or facing any real challenges. But everything is gonna change when his peaceful town gets attacked by sexy...eh, I mean scary demon. Suddenly, MC finds out that although he's one of the best in town but he's just a frog in the well.

on this sequel, you'll guide him through new place and new people, uncover the secrets of world.

But it's not just about defeating bad guys, It's also about relationships, and his destined fate.

Key Features
linear storytelling in the style of visual novel games. You'll meet lots of cool characters in the game, and you can become friends with them or have a good affair with them.

Battles

You'll have exciting turn base battles in the game, where you can pick your decision and make smart choices during fights to beat'em all for your survival and build your relationship to lead to the thing you love... I mean really really LOVE.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains nudity and sexual content, which included:
Animated sex (CG) , Non-consensual sex.
All characters are over the age of 18.

on this sequel, you'll guide him through new place and new people, uncover the secrets of world.

But it's not just about defeating bad guys, It's also about relationships, and his destined fate.

You'll have exciting turn base battles in the game, where you can pick your decision and make smart choices during fights to beat'em all for your survival and build your relationship to lead to the thing you love... I mean really really LOVE.
name: GARMM Adventurer Vol.2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: 1 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10
  • DirectX: Version 7.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: -
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: -

short_description: After a while since Vol.1. The MC lived peacefully in the town until that day his town is attacked by sexy...eh, I mean scary demon, so he just know he can't live like this anymore. VN element with turn-base fighting and animated sex scenes.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Thai, Turkish
